attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Research carried out by Phillips UK Road Atlas has found that North Wales collects more in revenue for speeding fines than anywhere else in the UK.

North Wales Police state 'Our success is measured in lower casualties'

And so with this in mind the obvious link here is that driving at  a responsible speed and paying attention to the road is safer than constantly watching your clock and being unable to increase your speed to avoid any danger. 

This survey has proved one thing speeding is not a danger on the roads, poor attention to the road is to blame, which is being made worse due to introduction of yet more speed camera's which serve no purpose except generate an income to local police forces by penalissing the safe driving public.

SPEED CAMARAS ARE A DANGER TO ROAD USERS AND SHOULD BE BANNED
!
